commit.message:
re PR c++/14428 (incompatible template declarations accepted)

	PR c++/14428
	* pt.c (redeclare_class_template): Check the type of non-type and
	template template parameter.

	* g++.dg/template/redecl2.C: New test.

From-SVN: r86550
